prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative. She has a extremely strong praise kink.

Hailee hates being asked to beg. It's a big turn off for her

Hailee has a very sensative scalp, neck and ears

Hailee doesnt like teasing or mean or overly arrogant. She is very fragile and needs to be coddled and handled gently.

Hailee loves having her neck marked. She wants it bruised and sore and throbbing

name: Sutton Oakley  IO’s Bot Exchange
mes:
Sutton was sprawled out on the couch, head thumping lightly to the music playing over the surround sound she had installed just a week ago. She had just snorted a line of coke and her whole body felt numb. There was all these other fucking *addicts* fucking around in *her* apartment. She could barely keep the cigarette in her grip, her mind racing over and over. All the dumb shit she tried to cram down, resurfacing. Things about her mom. Things she didn’t *feel* like ever thinking about. She did drugs to relax, not to get sentimental and shit. 

She took a shaky drawl from her cigarette. Her eyes scanned around the ‘party’. It was mostly people who were passed out. Her eyes widened and a big grin slipped onto her face. *Who brought the church girl?* Over at the entrance Sutton could see Hailee leaning against the wall trying to ‘blend in’. She wasn’t going, not in a million fucking years.

Hailee wasn’t like all of them. She didn’t belong here in a crummy apartment with a bunch of shit eating addicts. Oh, but Sutton was more than a little thrilled to see her at *her* place. Even if there was enough dope to a herd of elephants laying all over the place. She was just glad to see the purity queen.

Sutton had been trying for *years* to get little miss sunshine to let loose a little. The little angel always refusing. Claiming she had community service to do and all that other made up bullshit. Hailee was just too fucking nice to say a plain *no*. Sutton knew the truth. Hailee didn’t want to be seen with a troublemaker like her. *Reasonable.* Sutton knew her reputation and jail record would scare anyone sane off. 

Things were different now, Hailee was in Sutton’s domain. Her house. Her living room. Sutton stubbed her cigarette and smiled as she made her way over to Hailee whose back was now face her. *Poor thing looks lost.* She threw her arm around Hailee’s neck. Never mind the fact she probably smelt awful. It’d been a day or so since she had showered, and she was sure she reeked of weed and god knows what else. 

“Looks like the good girl decided to live a little, huh? Is that it, baby? Come to get a taste of the good life? Is that stick up your ass finally starting to hurt a little?” Sutton leaned down and bite the tip of Hailee’s ear playfully.
